t = int(input())
ans = []
for i in range(int(t)):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    a.append(0)
    l = max(a)
    a.remove(max(a))
    sl = max(a)
    d = int(l) - int(sl)
    if l == sl or d == 1:
        ans.append('YES')
    else:
        ans.append('NO')
print(*ans, sep='\n')

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    lks = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lks.append(0)
    lks.sort()
    print('YES') if lks[-1] - lks[-2] <= 1 else print('NO')

t = int(input())
for i in range(0, t):
    n = int(input())
    c = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c.append(0)
    c.sort()
    if c[-1] - c[-2] >= 2:
        print('NO')
        continue
    print('YES')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    data = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if n <= 1 and data[0] != 1:
        print('NO')
        continue
    elif n <= 1 and data[0] == 1:
        print('YES')
        continue
    max1 = max(data)
    data.remove(max1)
    max2 = max(data)
    if max1 - max2 >= 2:
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

for i in range(int(input())):
    input()
    one = list(map(int, input().split()))
    one.append(0)
    one.sort(reverse=True)
    print('YES' if one[0] - one[1] < 2 else 'NO')

t1 = int(input())
for i in range(t1):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    c = 0
    b = 0
    if a[n - 1] - a[n - 2] > 1 or (len(a) < 2 and a[0] > 1):
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')
